alert.note: Alert for Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:13PM CDT until July 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN STONE...SOUTHEASTERN SEARCY...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...VAN BUREN AND NORTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 1013 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Old Lexington to near Clinton to near Hector, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Hector... Shirley... Rocky Hill... Dillen... Broomfield... Dabney... Solo... Smyrna... Elba... Woolum... Old Lexington... Choctaw... Elberta... Bertha... Leslie... Beverage Town... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Rupert... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
